title-part.text: SERVICING, CLEANING, REPAIRING, SUPPORTING, LIFTING, OR MANOEUVRING OF VEHICLES, NOT OTHERWISE PROVIDED FOR

note.note-paragraph: Attention is drawn to the Note following the title of class B60.
In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

reference.text: by apparatus not integral with vehicle B60S3/00; cleaning in general B08B; de-icing of aircraft B64D; heating arrangements specially adapted for transparent or reflecting areas H05B3/84

note.note-paragraph:
Group B60S5/06 is impacted by reclassification into group B60L53/80.
Groups B60S5/06 and B60L53/80 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.
